CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 16, 1961, pg. A3 reads: " 'New Era' Dawns at Herron Hill Junior High - Absorbing Education - Eugene Khorey, social studies team leader, is lecturing to a large group of 50 students in a room converted to facilitate large group instruction. The instructor uses an overhead projector as he lectures. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Eugene G. Khorey, standing next to projector, lecturing to classroom of young women and men seated at desks in Herron Hill Junior High School
